content.detailedDescription: march 12th, 2009 i spotted 3 star like objects, starting at 8:09pm. it was like a star moving across the sky. the color was amber to orange.  i seen it coming from the north. it was moving slowly south then it stopped. it remained hovering there until  about 8:40pm? it was fairly high up. then i saw it taking off near where it had hovered, it was dimly lit while hovering. it lit up and looked like a star as it was moving north, where it disappeared from view. the 2rd one i spotted, again looking like a star as it was moving from the south and it was low and west of me. it stopped and i lost where it was because of the trees in the backyard. i didn���t see it fly away. the 3th one i seen it coming from the east and after it got to about 12:00 over me it curved  nw. it went that direction and way down on the horizon where it appeared to come done considerably in altitude. then  speed up and stopped. then headed back my way again on an angle upwards and stops. then it went back nw to about where it had stopped before. then stopped and descended and i thought it was going to land, but it stopped. it then rose up back up, then stopped and  moved south a little then move north and stopped. it then descended again a little and rose back up a little  and stopped. then started south and made a ���u��� turn as it turned up very sharply at about 135 degree up and northward. it climbed up fairly high (4,000ft ???).  it then leveled off and flew north where it was soon out of sight. i lost it to the north. this was probably about 9:15pm. i came in at about 9:30pm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Round objects, amber to orange in color, silent.

content.detailedDescription: I have to drive home several nights a week after dark.  in the last few months i have repeated experiences where i've seen ufo's.  the first time i was driving home and i saw these strange lights i knew they were close to the ground because i would kinda lose track of them for moments behind the trees.  when i approached where these lights were i noticed these lights were all on the same object. this object was triangle in shape with red lights at all 3 points, between two of the red lights along the same line were 2 yellow lights it was dark in color or it reflected the darkness. this object was not 50ft from the ground and about 20ft. from the main highway (right beside me) it turned about 180 degrees like it was looking down on me,and that is actually when i saw the second yellow light.  about 2 days later, same scenerio, but this time the object had blue lights only at the 3 points, again it turned right around as to look at me. if you were wondering i slowed down almost to a stop in the road both times but it is a little unnerving not knowing the origin or intent of these crafts.  a few days later same scenerio,driving home,this time there were 2 crafts hovering in the same area the one with the blue lights and the other one had the same lights they were just the opposite as before three white lights at the points and two red lights in between.  they were a little further off the road and seemed to be tilted forward as if looking at the ground.  this is a very rural area with a few houses. the objects were kind of in a field surrounded by trees. this seems to be ongoing as i saw the one with the red lights again tonight this time the white lights were strobing.  this is not my first experience in this area, 16 years ago (5 min. from this new area)i was sitting at home, my husband went outside for something and stuck his head in the door and said you have got to come see this!  we had a guest and he as well went outside with us, there was  a large (appox. 50ft across) silver disk just hovering over the power line in front of my house it made no noise and it seemed to be in no hurry (just like the other ones it's like they don't care if you see them) it had round white lights all the way around it that strobed around in a circle and had a dome on top.  i went back in the house not knowing what to do and to gather my thoughts but was drawn back out to see.  it was so close to my house i was literally afraid!  it slowly moved on by and off into the field by my house and just disappeared before my eyes!  now just who could you tell this story to?  well i've told it to you.  i am interested to know what they are upto.  i've written a blog on the ufo files and someone said they might be looking for certain minerals in my area.  which kinda makes sense since they were looking at the ground. makes me a bit uncomfortable! if i had a good camera i could probably see right into the craft!
content.summary: I have seen two triangle shaped crafts on many occasions in the last 2 months they hover near the ground and not far off the road they seem to be in the same place at the same time of day repeatedly.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday 3-15-09 @ approx. 10pm i went outside to look at the night sky with my binoculars since the sky was perfectly clear. after about 2 minutes i saw a small private jet flying at about 1500ft at 45 deg due south of my viewing point that was heading north on a path that would take it directly over my head. i wanted to get a better view so i used my binoculars to look more closely at the aircraft, when i did, i notice a faint blue/grey light that was slightly behind the aircraft but at a seemingly much higher altitude that i estimated was about the same height that i usually observe satellites at. by faint i mean that this light was not visible with the naked eye and was not a sharp pinpoint of light like most satellites but about twice the size and hazey. the other odd thing was that it moved about 2 to 3x faster than any satellite i've seen and i say it followed the jet only in the sense that it's pace seemingly matched that of the jet, never gaining or losing distance relative to the aircraft. this sighting lasted only about a minute before both objects were out of view. i observed 3 satellites in the next 5 minutes after this sighting and they were exactly what i am use to seeing and very much different from the blue/grey light.
content.summary: Faint high altitude blue/grey light following small jet.

content.detailedDescription: Pease vssit http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lbwktjmxd5u and tell me if this video is real or not , and please notify at my adrees
content.summary: Ovni.

content.detailedDescription:
i dont have any pictures, only my story. so if you require pictures then i can only suggest you stop here.

last night at about 9:45pm aest i was playing counter strike and decided it was time for a smoke. i stepped out the front and walked over to the cars and stood inbetween them on the driveway, because it was a bit chilly.

i was looking around the sky (as i do) and noticed a star 'moving'. at first i though it was a sattalite, which to me is something nice to see aswell.. but it started changing course, rapidly. at one point the light was coming straight for me and at this point i started stepping back (tripping over a car) and sorta hid behing the brick wall of the house, but never taking my eyes off this object.

the light dimmed and appeared to face away from me, then crept across the sky turning a red colour and dissapearing.

i should also note that when the light looked like it was facing me it had two blue lights on the front i suppose.

the object appeared to be very far up. higher that a jet or any plane. and a plane has never acted like what i have described.

i can draw up a picture in paint or something i suppose, or take a picture in the daytime (i tried to take a picture last night, but iphones dont like the night!) and give you an idea of what i am talking about.

again, sorry for no pictures.

im just as shattered as you are.
content.summary: Star like object flying through sky (read long).

content.detailedDescription:
On the history channel (hist hd) airing in massachusetts at 5:30 pm on   3-16-09.  the show was called "death road"
about 1/2 way through the program, just after it shows a blue and white bus on the death road going past a waterfall that is cascading on the road, then several seconds later, the video showed a view of the valley and monutians heading towards la paz. at that point in the upper right quadrant of the video, you can very plainly see a silver ball slowly flying across the view in the sky from left to right and the shot lasted about 8 seconds. i could see clearly mountians far behind and below the object and they were were in clear detail as the show was in hd and my tv is a large screen tv. 
i thought perhaps it was a helicopter,but whereas i could see objects below and further away in very good detail, i did not think that it was the camera pixilating over a helicopter. although there probably was a helicopter in use during the show. 

anyway, i thought that perhaps someone on your staff could retrieve the program and check it out. i reviewed the video as i had recorded it and looked at the video perhaps 20 times. i came back to the initial conclusion, maybe a ufo. 

richard barbieri 3-16-09
ashby, ma
content.summary: Saw it in tv on a film about the "death road."

content.detailedDescription:
It was a warm summer evening in lima, peru. i (aprox. 14? years old) was playing soccer with my younger cousin at the third floor at home. since rain is a seldom phenomenon in lima, we don������t have many traditional covering roofs. so we were more or less playing "out-door". the ball was bouncing against the wall and coming back towards us. suddenly i had a strange feeling of having to stop the ball and look up to the cloudless sky. my cousin stole me the ball and i kept looking up towards the sky. nothing new up there for the moment, but in less than one second 3 glowing beautiful blue lights came from different directions and stopped just over my head making a triangular form. now that i������m older i assume the distance between us was approximately 500-700 meters (1640-2296 feet). they stood still some seconds and started to turn around the triangle axis with constant speed, with no signs of acceleration. i had to look up and couldn������t look down. it was like a hypnosis going on there. my cousin kept playing with the ball giving this happening no sign of interest. suddenly they stopped without slowing down the speed, more or less than freezing a frame on a tv-dvd. they made one last blinking signal and dissapeared in a fraction of a second. only the stars remained in the sky. 
i asked my cousin about what happened but he didn������t pay that kind of attention since he was very young and more interested in kicking the ball. myself, i don������t have any explanation for this event. my dad worked at the airport in the jungle peru������s and i know many different kinds of planes and helicopters. but this wasn������t any of those. they came and went as silent as a sneaking snake.
it was one of the most beautiful experiences of my life...
when i see videos in the net about ufos sometimes i recognize the same glowing formations that i������ve seen once there. i don������t feel that alone with my experience anymore.

yours,

a. martinez
content.summary: Tree blue lightning points take the shape of a triangle and start to rotate.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside having a smoke, it's quite dark and i can see a few blinking plane lights at different points in the sky. i look straight up and notice a non blinking light seemingly much higher up that the tiny plane lights, and it was much brighter than plane lights. i watched it in fascination for several minutes and then it seemed to slow down and a much smaller light intersected light #1's path. light #1 passed over the horizon and i found light #2 and watched it go in the opposite direction, while doing so a third light passed near #2. while this is going on light #2 and #3 are getting harder to see (going up into outerspace?) until finally they are no longer visible. they did not pass over the horizon like #1. they seemed to be going at climbing angles into space. very exciting to see. we see these from time to time here. i never have my camera when i need it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 circular lights at different altitudes and directions, cross paths.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was 12:42 pm ,i was walking out to my car to plug my phone into its charger(i dont have a home charger). i hear the sound of a small plane flying above. there were alot of small planes in the sky that day most likely because it was the first day that summer was starting to reveal itself. i glance into the air to look at the plane and behind it i see something strange, there where two sphere shaped objects behind the plane, at first glance they looked like 2 balloons some one had release, i kept watching, and then i noticed the objects appeared to be following the plane! i kept watching, they were flying in a straight path then one of the objects circled the other one, between the size and the movements i ruled out it being a balloon about 30  seconds later the objects disappeared from view (from being to far away) at about the same time that i couldn't see the plane anymore. it was very strange and i had never seen anything like it before. i estimate the altitude to be about 3000 - 4000 ft and the size of the objects to be 8 - 15 ft in diameter and where white or creme. seemed to be traveling about a mile or so behind the plane.
content.summary: Sphere shaped ufo's follow small plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Heartlandillinois.Com/v2/about_us/unexplained_photo.Php

what are these things? i think they're identical.
content.summary: Re vertical light appeared / link to video exact same units.

content.detailedDescription:
my son is now 23-years-old and lives in a group-home in gwinn, michigan. he was born with a rare genetic condition called 48xx/yy syndrome, a rare condition that causes physical problems as well as many emotional and behavioral problems. he has a cognitive i.Q. of 79, which is high for his condition. basically, he is very verbal and insightful and can distinguish reality from fantasy.
  my son, who i'll call james, was about 12 years old when he had a close encounter. we live in a rural area of upper michigan about 9 miles from escanaba on 40 acres of land. one night my wife and i decided to go to bed at around 10:00 and asked james if he wanted to go to bed. he asked if he could stay up to watch a t.V. program that he wanted to watch. my wife and i agreed and went to bed and fell fast asleep.
  upon waking the next day we were shocked at a story that james told to us about what happened the night before. james said that he went to the kitchen to make a peanut butter sandwich when he noticed, through our large twin picture windows at the southern side of our kitchen,an unusual light hovering above the tree line, which is about 150 yards to the back of the kitchen, seperated by a field. i quickly pointed out that it was just an airplane, being that airplanes normaly took a direct route over the edge of our land enroute to the delta county airport. to our surprise, he became agitated by my presumption and insisted that it was not an airplane!
  i told him to calm down and explain what he saw. he said that the light was not moving like an airplane and was perfectly still in the air about 50 to 100 feet above the tree line. he said that it then floated towards the house over the field about 50 feet off the ground (as high as the pine tree at the right of our back yard, for height referance) and stopped between the apple tree and the garage,that is 40 feet from our house, and hovered motionless without a sound, but he felt a vibrating hum in the house.
  when i grilled him about such a fantastic story, he said that the craft was about 15 feet across and 25 feet high and shaped like an ice cream cone and glowing a purplish color with lights that surrounded the middle of the object. he said that the object floated in slow-motion to the left (east) until it stopped above our pumphouse where we get our fresh water.It hovered there for a minute or so and then slowly moved out over the field and suddenly shot up into the air "faster than a jet" and disappeared up into the sky. 
  my wife and i didn't know what to make of the story, being that james had never created such a fantastic story before and he was adament that he was telling the truth. since that time i have grilled him periodically on this episode and have even suggested that he was watching a u.F.O. program that inspired the story, but every time i do so he gets upset and repeats the exact same story in detail that he told to us that morning! 
  i believe him and i wonder how many sightings there have been that have been shrugged-off simply because the observer was developementally or phychologically impaired, even though a similar story may have been accepted by a "normal" observer? thank you, dan.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ice cream cone shaped ufo over land.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 2008 i was finishing an evening walk and noticed a strange orange light in the night sky. when i got home, i grabbed my video camera and started recording. watch the video and notice the different colors from this object. also watch around the 35 sec mark where another "object" appears and quickly disappears. i didn't have a tripod, so there is some camera movement. the video is slowed down but otherwise unaltered and is only a small part of the total recording. the jpg contains captures from the video. this object moved slowing in different directions before fading away.
content.summary: Video of orange star-like object.

content.detailedDescription: Once again my husband and i were in the hot tub looking at stars. we were facing south, some overcast clouds when we noticed what looked like 2 stars that made eyes, with a cloud nose, and cloud mouth. we were laughing that it looked like a face. it was a perfect face. then all of a sudden the right eye of our face started moving from south west to east. it was perfectly round and not very far away from us. an approaching for landing 747 jet passed under it ( we are in the path for the airport)and we think that's why it started moving east. it was under the cloud cover as we watched it perfectly move into a cloud and lost it. it was not out in space at all. it was sitiing there in our face that we saw. so wierd. we see this stuff all the time. i have reported several of these sightings.
content.summary: Star like sphere under cloud cover, not up in space.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

i'm not making any claims here, i didn't see this thing but my camera caught it. i would like to know if anyone has seen something similar to this.
we live on a farm in the country and something was setting off my driveway
sensor for several nights. our dog charlie was disturbed about this but i was unable to spot the source of his concern. after several nights i installed my wildlife camera below the driveway sensor and captured the attached images. the quality is not that great. i have no idea what could have made this light. the camera was facing north into the woods on a hill, no way it could have been a car or lights from afar. any info on similar light formations would be appreciated.
content.summary: Vertical light appeared from the woods - set off driveway alarm.

content.detailedDescription:
4 buddies and i were having a bbq in the back yard of my house in south pasadena, los angeles, california. we were standing, joking around. must've been 7:30 - 7:45 and a medium-bright, white-light caught my eye traveling at medium-fast speed. with no sound. not blinking. traveling straight. i could assume that it was no more than 3mi. north of us traveling east, apparently flying directly over the city of pasadena. there were no other air craft seen or heard during this sighting. as soon as i realized that there was no sound and that it still wasn't blinking i said to my buddies: "help me witness this" to get them to turn and look. i got their attention... they confirmed that there was no sound and that there were no blinking lights, only one light consistently illuminated. there were some clumping clouds... and we saw it for 30-45 seconds as it moved in the space where the clouds had cleared; only a couple hundred feet above these clouds. then saw it slightly again through a smaller break in the clouds. then it disappeared into the clouds. a minute later, we saw a jet air plane at almost the same height fly directly above us with normal lights and normal sounds. by this, we were able to gauge that we weren't def, blind and crazy...
...Then for some reason we did... we went crazy for 3min. we laughed hysterically, "flipped out", rallied...Repeated the saying: "i cant f***in' believe that!" and "oh my f***in' god!. 

i seriously could not believe that my first sighting was almost trivial. 

i went inside to bring my dad a plate and quickly tell him what happened... and (without warning) when i came back out my friends were all packed up ready to leave like they had something to do. i guess they were a little too "freaked out" . 

i've been a believer for over 10 years and i listen to coast to coast from time to time, but never had a direct experience. this is my first sighting, and im so glad a had some close buddies share it with instead of being alone when this happened. i've done enough research to know that this was very low profile sighting. but i dont care, i know that every little bit helps. this sighting has turned me from a "believer" to a "knower". however i really hope you get a corroborating report. i'd love to hear it and share it with my buds. 
also if there is some explanation for this sighting please let me know.

d
content.summary: A silent craft witnessed by 5 people.

content.detailedDescription:
It was blue shaped like a football and had two circles in center, the center circle was blue and had a white ring around it. it was silent and flew over fairbanks alaska at 12:51 am and was in full view for one minute then flew very fast towards the north east of fairbanks, i chased it with my car but gave up very quickly after reaching 90mph and it was very obvious i never had a chance to keep up. i do not think our fastest
jets could have touched this thing! it went so fast it it was like it just faded away ...........
i saw it fly over going towards the north east of fairbanks i was leaving walmart when i first seen it, i could not help but see it because of the size and color i knew it was not a plane or helicopter.
i was scared at first then i got very excited but really was wishing for my video camera and regular camera which i will carry every where i go now.
content.summary: Blue football pointed both ends round in mid. blue circle in center w/white ring around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading to my car to listen to some music and smoke some cigarettes.  i have been fixated with the sky and all that it harbors since i have been a child.  this is a clear night a two or three  hundred feet off of lake st. clair here in michigan, three or four miles north of the lights of the little downtown area in this community so the stars and planets are always brilliant on a clear night such as this. 

after i exit my back door i look up and scan, as i always do, and my eyes are instantly attracted to a large human aircraft in the western sky traveling northeast, maybe at an altitude of several thousand feet high. there is selfridge air national guard base about 6-10 miles north/northeast of my house.  and i have observed several types of  aircraft  in both the day and night coming and going in my 7 months of living in this community of st. clair shores, michigan. 

this plane had two fixed lights on its wings with the red flashing lights  in the middle. the second i saw the airplane i saw a bright light, seemingly so close to it as it appeared to me looking from below, that i took a deep breath thinking that it was another plane and if they were at close enough altitudes they were about to collide. but strangely the plane kept going in its path northeast and this light, nothing blinking like the other craft, just a light, it carried on west/northwest.

 then  my attention was grabbed by a similar star like light in the southern sky traveling east, also in a straight line, as the other light was traveling in its direction, just as the plane was in its.  all three objects resembled the same speed to my perception. so i am looking at both of the lights moving and the plane traveling over my head, of course one at a time, but then the light in the western sky abruptly disappeared as i was looking at it!  this was very odd because there were no clouds for the object to fly into or over, and there were no other significant celestial objects in that patch of the western edge of the northern sky for it to obscure my view of it, or for me to mistake the light for it. and if anything it should have reappeared.  

my eyes confirmed that the bright light was gone when i looked back over to the other light in the southern sky traveling east when a few seconds after i re-tracked it, it too disappeared from my sight as i am watching it. i looked back to the airplane and saw it was still traveling on its path northeast. 

 not saying i am professionally trained or anything but once again i have been obsessive over the sky since i was a child and i have learned a great deal about my favorite sciences astronomy and cosmology and my love for aerospace has taught me how to track with my eyes where a moving object is going and were it should be in the sky after a few seconds have elapsed, if it is man made.  

the key points i am making to myself and to mufon is this:  i can't stress enough how clear of a night this is, the celestial spheres are bright and it was easy to see both the lights and the airplane and distinguish them from the stars and planets which do not move as the lights and the plane were.  i tracked the airplane till it was out of sight.  so i am sure that i should have been able to see those lights traveling in their respective paths until they should have disappeared out of sight.  and the one traveling northwest should have stayed in sight longer than the plane.  but those two lights vanished, and i could no longer see them when they should have occupied the sky for at least the same amount of time as the plane because of where they were when i first observed the three of them.  like everything regarding life, i have my theories, but i can't explain this.
content.summary: I saw two different lights traveling in the sky then disappear at the same time i was observing a civilian aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I kept watching, it didn't move.  i didn't see blimp (goodyear) on tv, didn't see pic's of blimp over the stadium in phila (not the vet, the new one), on tv, kept watching from my kitchen window which faces south.  i can often seen fireworks out my back window. i even went outside to look but couldn't see from ground.  lights seemed to be in a cloud, greenish-gaseous, not moving (cloud), blinking lights of various colors.  thought it was weird but assumed it had something to do w/telecommunications & 2008 world series coverage.  on the other hand it just stayed there and didn't seem to move.  i kept checking and it was still there a couple hours later.  obviously it could probably be easily explained - except that on the following philly home games during the world series, i didn't see anything more resembling - sky was clear on one night and on actual win it was horribly raining so didn't see anything but i kept checking back to see if same phenominon occured on other dates during the ws.  i believe the lights i saw were on/around that preceding sunday or possibly monday before the phils win.

this was from my kitchen window, i was getting something to drink between commercials on the ws televised game.  what made me first notice object was that it was a weird greenish light, just hovering and didn't move.  i purposely turned my lights off, pulled up a chair and watched it for a good 10 minutes.  when i first noticed it i thought it might be a goodyear type blimp over the stadium - how else to account for it and it would make sense since it was in direction of where stadium would be and there would be a reason for a blimp to be hovering, covering world series.

i didn't lose sight of the object per se, i simply went to bed b/c i had to get up for work. i don't recall it leaving the area that evening but wasn't there at all the next few evenings (i checked).

haven't seen it since.  often see lights in sky since to the south, out my window, some miles away, is philly international airport so no big deal to see lights moving, hear planes and helicopters overhead at any given time.
content.summary: Greenish cloud w/blue & red & white lights, hovering over s. phila during sunday of world series. i assumed was a goodyear blimp.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i and a friend were sitting in the backyard around 8:35pm 03/15/09 when our friend pointed at the sky. when i looked up we saw a pill shaped blinking lighted object streaking across the sky to the northwest at high speed. it was low enough to be in the clouds and was totally silent. i called my father about it. my daughter was staying the night with him. they both saw the same thing around the same time and traveling in the same direction. they were in huntsville about 25 miles south of us. they heard a loud noise, looked up and saw a pill shaped object going northwest, blinking on and off. they said the noise was very loud for an object at that altitude and reverberated. when it came over us it was silent.
content.summary: Blinky craft over hazel green, al.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a bright, sunny day. lots of birds singing. no other noises. i was taking photos of a historical mansion and i found an object in the sky of one photo once i got home.
i never saw this while i was there, nor did i hear it. i take careful notes of the ambient sounds out there as i usually record for evps (often i am successful). there were no planes, helis or anything else there,that i heard. it doesn't look like a bird to me. it appears to be too large and pretty high up in relation to the tree and the house.
i would like professional input please
content.summary: Found in photo only.

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was @ 16 years old, i'm 32 now. i was watching bats in my front yard when i heard a low hum. i looked west and saw a cube shaped object with 5 or 6 dim brownish bars of light that ran horizontaly along it. i remember estimating it's size to be about the same as an average house. it was flying about 150 to 200 yards above the ground, around 30 mpr. at the time (i was 16) i thought i was watching a satelite landing at the air force academy. at the time i didn't think twice about it being extraterrestrial. i always had thought how lucky i was to see something so cool, untill i got older and realized that satelites don't land.
content.summary: Quiet cube humming north.

content.detailedDescription: Went out on deck facing east.  light low in the sky caught my eye.  watched go over thinking it was an airplane headed for dia.  i see and hear many airplanes as i am in a flight path. suddenly the light just blinked out.  there was no noise no navigation lights for it to be so low.  airspace is crowded and navigation light would have had to be on.  no sound. no navigation light or strobes. very strange.
content.summary: Light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a frozen lake in the ny adirondack park my friend and i had stopped on our atv's for a break in the middle of a isolated frozen lake. we started looking at the stars as there were no clouds anywhere identifying constelations (orion big dipper etc) and enjoying the pristine beauty. we imediately saw a satelite passing over then a while later a jet plane probably aproaching albany airport upon watching the jet pass south to albany we saw another light brighter and continious (no blinking light at all) coming over the horizon imediately thinking it was another jet but it was moving much faster as it approached aned was unusually bright. we waited to hear the jet engines as it neared as we had before but never did. it passed over us south of our position from roughly south west to north east (we had no compass so this is a very rough guess i am basing the direction on the direction of the jets flying to albany) as it neared it was much brighter than any star in the sky and appeared to be diamond shaped and i would guess 35,000+ ft. after it passed over head it kept climbing and winked out in a split second i dont mean went over the horizon i mean traveled ito space and disapeared. we imediately looked at each other and agreed we had not seen a plane or satelite. we began to question what it could have been and decided it had to be the space shuttle but even that didnt agree with what we saw. we noted the time as 8.25 eastern (ny) (by rons watch (which was correct to my computer which i checked when we got back home) i went to nasa's web page and they launched much earlier and as i said before this did not look like a rocket. i do not believe what i saw was the space shuttle. it did not appear to be a rocket it made no noise and was too low to have been the shuttle. i would imagine on a clear night in upstate ny someone else had to have seen the same thing. i also checked to see if the koreans launched anything but nothing has been reported. please let me know if anyone else saw this object as i have never seen anything like it in my 44 years. i never saw it turn it continiously climbed in a straight line into space at a rate that was starteling. i cant wait to see what if anything is reported.   thank you. i swear this entire story is the truth so help me god.
content.summary: Brilliant star like light  appeared diamond shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 19:30 on saturday, march 14, i observed the following:

observers location: 
latitude 42.80
longitude -83.01

weather conditions
temp 33.8 ���f	
humidity: 70%	
visibility: 12.0 miles	
wind dir: sse	
wind speed: 4.6 mph	 -	
conditions: partly cloudy

ufo(s) shape(s)
craft 1 is circular all surfaces rounded, bottom slightly crowned surface, top cone shaped, no discernible lighting or markings
craft 2 comprised of three smaller versions of craft 1 together

ufo(s) speed 
approximate estimate 120 knots (222 km/h)

ufo(s) altitude 
approximate estimate 2000ft ��� 4000ft 

ufo(s) direction
track: from south to north 

ufo(s) color
both craft light grey metallic dull or matte in surface finish with low light reflectivity
larger disk has distinct darker grey band around circumference 

ufo(s) sound
silent ��� no detectable sound

ufo(s) special characteristic [unexplainable halo]
each craft was surrounded by a translucent halo that distorted the light and atmosphere directly enveloping the craft. this band of distortion was ordered and not random. a distinct pattern was present in the halo. the ripples and waves of this translucent halo gave the appearance of emanating from the craft.  

while sitting outside with my dog casually observing the clear sky and evening sunshine. i first observed the objects in the southern sky at a low declination. as i live near to a small airport with frequent light aircraft departures and approaches, aircraft are a familiar sight. 

however, within the span of a second, it was clear to me the craft did not fit any definitive criterion of known aeronautical craft.  as an engineer with extensive aviation experience and knowledge, i have a larger than normal list of criteria. without an explanation for the speed, altitude, shape, and ballistics demonstrated by the craft i was observing i became immediately riveted, curious, but calm, and methodically analytical. 

as the objects approached toward my observation point, more detail became clear. i could at this point clearly make out precise shape, color, and the above stated characteristics. what my eyes saw my brain had no immediate explanation for. first the shape of the object defies the laws of classical physics, and should fall from the sky at any moment. second there is dead silence, no sound of a propulsion system of any kind. third i observed that both flying objects where in a controlled wobble, that is to say they appeared to exhibit the same characteristics as light aircraft traveling at the low limits of airspeed. a gentle rocking or tipping left to right was readily apparent. 

of particular fascination and interest to me was the transparent halo around each craft. i am taking some liberty with the facts by saying this appeared to be a energy field. the halo or aura if you prefer was distinct and visible as a translucent pattern that distorted the atmosphere and visible light in zone that completely enveloped the both crafts. honestly, the effects of the halo where quite disturbing on my senses, and seemed almost surreal. i think these feelings are normal for anyone seeing all he has ever learned, experienced and seen about flight and the physics of flight defied. the entire experience is quite unforgettable, but i suspect it is seeing this halo that will stay in my memory forever. i have seen heat waves in the mohave and sonoran deserts reach 200 meters above the surface. never could i have imagined a force so strong as to distort the atmosphere in such a distinct manner as i observed on march 14. the distortion had a ordered pattern, it was not chaotic and random. 

i watched the craft travel to the north as long could observe them with the naked eye. having already calculated the approximate speed i knew any effort to retrieve a camera would have been futile. i witnessed this alone and have no one to corroborate these events. i am a professional engineer with 24 years experience. i am currently in fine health. i simply cannot explain what i saw, and i have no factual evidence of any kind to offer anyone. all can provide you with is my testimony. 

my rational mind keeps seeking for a scientific explanation. but at this point, what i saw in the sky march 14 simply does not exist within my understanding of science and any aircraft i am aware of. weather balloons do not travel at 3000 ft, 120 knots against the wind, and have a patterned distortion enveloping them.
content.summary: Two flying craft both grey color, silent, low altitude, low speed with translucent halo observed over romeo, michigan.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw the leader the size of about 3 football fields mass only, jett-black in color. jagged edges all around of no similar pattern estimate about 40,000 feet in altitude. this came through my window of view in the northern milky way galaxy.
directly behind one pair split apart in tight central formation of the leader. exactly like the leader only smaller in size, if combined together they would equal about half the size of the leader. directly, behind another pair only smaller than the first pair. in tight formation and central alignment of the first pair, exactly alike all the rest in shape and color, together in mass the second pair would be equal to anyone of the first paired objects. the sixth object directly behind the pack and in central alignment of the last pair.  same as all the rest only the size was about half that of one the second paired objects. the seventh object was about half the size and the sixth same shapes and color. the background sky was a deep midnight blue and these object were all solid jet black, i saw only the bottom dimension of these craft as they came out of the north about 45 degrees at ground view.  all of these disappeared into the dome of a massive cumulous anvil cloud to the far south about on nebraksa/kansas state line.  i would estimate the cloud height to be 38,000 feet.  this sighting last less than ten seconds, not a sound, not a light and they darkened the stars out as they zipped across the sky at an super sonic frightening speed.  they were solid and hard to determine how deep they were, as they came straight overhead.
i was standing on the corner of west 13th and n.Custer ave. i have one witness and he saw the last of the formation at the end when they disappeared through the clouds in the south. the previous hours before this occurred we were star gazing,counting and spotting meteors out while his sister was at a skate birthday event just inside. what i thought about when i first saw these objects caused my knees to buckel from pure fear or super startelled in awe. it was almost as if i was sunday punched without notice in pure darkness. after the event and walking the last leg home to my house from my friends, i thought about what i saw and felt powerlessness, nothing of this earth would have any chance in hell to combat what i saw, if they were hostile towards man.  i tried to tell my parents what i saw but they wouldn't listen being glued to the t.V. watching ronald reagan give his exceptance speech. i was 15 years old at the time and not a day goes by without thinking of what i saw.  i have a photographic memory of these craft and can send a picture.  view this picture on maximum so the that pixel patten would give you a better and realistic view of what i saw.  the white dots are background stars and this flew over my head and disappeared through the dome of a massive cumulous cloud estimated 100 mile due south of north platte nebraska.
content.summary: Ellipse slight oblong, 7 total in tight formation out of the north, frightening speed, no sound, if i blinked my eyes would have missed it!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went outside into the back yard to feed the dogs.  enjoyed the partly sunny sky and mild weather after enduring several long days of rain.  it was about 5:10pm when i placed the feeding bowls down for the dogs to begin eating.  i made a quick call on the cell phone while remaining outside.  as i hung up the phone i noted the time was 5:14pm and i casually looked towards the sky as i began to place the cellpnone in my pocket when something in the eastern sky caught my attention.  first i thought it was a plane but the shape was something different from most planes i see in the sky.  it had a shape that really wasn't round but not  cigar or cylinderal either.  hard to really explain.  it was moving southward and would move behind clouds and fading contrails.  remembering that my cell phone had a camera, i took it out of my pocket and tried to take a picture but never could zoom in close enough to get a good snap.  i watched it for 30 to 45 seconds before my attention went back to the dogs.
content.summary: Feeding dogs when casually looked up and saw object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Two days after christmas, it was very warm, so my friend and i were sitting outside on the porch in the evening talking.  suddenly, we saw a brilliant flash of beautiful blue to blue-green light, illuminate the entire sky for an instant. after about 5 seconds, there was a second flash of this same colored light. no sound, no thunder, no lightning.  all the clouds lit up. there was nothing else to be seen. i can't emphasize enough how beautiful this light was. i noticed that a similar event was recorded in auburn hills on the nuforc website on dec. 24, 2008.
content.summary: 2 huge flashes of brilliant blue light illuminates the sky, canton, michigan.

content.detailedDescription:
6:30pm february 25, 2009

i was picking up a freind, less than a mile from my home.  
while waiting at his front door i saw 3 red pulsating lights glide down the street.  i rang the door bell and 3 of us watched this triangle glide through the air.  it was not airplanes, helicopters, baloons, kites or anything we could indentify.  we saw a plane flying somewhat above and to the right of it.  it was very peculiar.

3 witnesses.

i am very interested to know if anyone in marlborough, ct saw this object.
it is hard to believe no one else saw this.

please contact me if anyone else saw this
 

thank you.
tony sciarra
content.summary: 3 red pulsating lights, triangular shape, gliding over marlborough, ct.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-275. i was alone. the time was somewhere between 8 and 10 pm. i had just pasted detroit metro airport heading toward canton.  there were many planes in the sky. as i approached the michigan avenue exit, i noticed 3 bright white lights low over the trees to the northwest of my position, moving slowly. at this point, they looked like they were simply in a straight line and about the size of a passenger jet.  i watched them as i drove, looking for any blinking lights or red and green wing lights that you typically see with planes.  there were no colored or blinking lights.  it seemed unusually low considering the distance from the airport. as i pasted the michigan avenue exit, almost to the rest area, i was about even with the lights. still no blinking lights. at this point, the lights banked slowly to the north, away from the airport. i was now quickly passing it, but as it banked, it then appeared to be a triangle shape with white lights at each corner and one smaller white light in the center. because i was passing it, i only saw it for a few seconds.  i debated whether to pull to the side of the road or go up to the next exit, come back around and try to follow it.  i decided i really wanted to get a closer look so i drove to the ford road exit then quickly went south on i-275. probably 5 minutes elapsed. i got off the michigan ave. exit and drove west and in that general area for about 15 minutes, but i could see no sign of it.  i was reluctant to report this because i saw the triangle shape so briefly, i wasn't sure what i was seeing. i decided to report when i saw on this data base another similar sighting in the romulus-canton area the 4 days prior to my sighting.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped lights low over trees in canton, michigan.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work at the time of the event the i was facing west south west on highway 158 near the high point along the bluff line shortly before the turnoff on to illinois 3 north on the south end of columbia, il.
at the time there was light scattered cloud cover and the moon was hazy in appearance.
i noticed an extremely bright trail appearing in the left area of windshield the trail was moving north to northwest across.  a path not uncommon to aircraft approaching st. louis lambert airport.  the brightness was on the order slightly less then that of an arc welder.  the color was solid white.
the length of the trail is hard to estimate but if i were to of held my thumb out at arm's length i am confident that the length would have been about twice the width of my thumb.  the object did not appear to be much about eye level i would say apx. 10 degrees above the horizon perhaps less.
i lost sight of the trail after it crossed about 80% of my windshield in about 2 seconds.  this is extremly fast when compared to normal air travel.
content.summary: An extremly bright trail.
